preprocess.archivehandling

Class ZipfileHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • preprocess.archivehandling.ZipfileHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArchiveHandler

    public class ZipfileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArchiveHandler
    Handler for zipfiles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZipfileHandler(int maxExtractionLevelDepth, java.io.File tempUnzipDir)
      Constructor with ability to set the maximum depth to which nested zip files will be extracted.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ZipfileHandler

        public ZipfileHandler(int maxExtractionLevelDepth,
              java.io.File tempUnzipDir)
               throws NoProperParameterException
        Constructor with ability to set the maximum depth to which nested zip files will be extracted.
        Parameters:
        maxExtractionLevelDepth - level to which nested archives are extracted
        tempUnzipDir - Temporary Directory to assist in extraction process. content will be deleted after process is finished.
        Throws:
        NoProperParameterException - thrown if ExtractionDepthLimit or TempDirectory aren't set properly

        Parameters:
        value - depth limit (must be positive or 0)
        Throws:

                      throws NoProperParameterException
        Description copied from interface: ArchiveHandler

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        NoProperParameterException - thrown if given tempDirectory is null

      • extractZip

        public void extractZip(java.io.File pathToZipfile,
              java.io.File outputFolder)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       java.util.zip.ZipException,
                       NoProperParameterException
        Description copied from interface: ArchiveHandler
        Extracts a specified archive to a specified location.
        Specified by:
        extractZip in interface ArchiveHandler
        Parameters:
        pathToZipfile - Specifies a path to a given archive which has to be extracted
        outputFolder - folder where folders and files are extracted to
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown if pathToZipFile is empty
        java.util.zip.ZipException - thrown if file isn't the needed archive format
        NoProperParameterException - thrown if extractiondepthlimit or tempdirectory aren't initialized

      • getFailedFiles

        public java.util.Collection<java.io.File> getFailedFiles()
        returns a list of files that end with .zip but aren't zipfiles. Attention: Only contains the CURRENT location of the file. That means if it's nested it will be in temp/nameOfTheFile.zip No information about the former location is stored anywhere!
        Returns:
        ArrayList with Files we tried to extract but are no zipfiles.

      • deleteFiles

        public void deleteFiles(java.io.File pathName)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        deletes all files in specified directory.
        Parameters:
        pathName - directory in which files shall be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if files couldn't be deleted

      • getEmptyDirs

        public java.util.Collection<java.io.File> getEmptyDirs()
        returns a list of files that are empty dirs which occurred in the makeZip method. Empty Folders will be ignored in this method so we need to document which folders will be ignored.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with Files.

      • makeZip

        public void makeZip(java.io.File inputLocation,
           java.io.File outputLocation)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                    NoProperParameterException
        Description copied from interface: ArchiveHandler
        Makes an archive by using the files specified and saves it at outputLocation. If the inputLocation is no valid path the method returns false and nothing will be done. If the outputLocation is no valid path all necessary folders will be created. Empty directories contained in the folder we want to make an archive of will be ignored.
        Specified by:
        makeZip in interface ArchiveHandler
        Parameters:
        inputLocation - files to be packed
        outputLocation - path to the location where the archive will be saved
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - thrown if inputLocation is empty
        NoProperParameterException - thrown if outputLocation is invalid
